name: Freyr Magnússon
bio: Freyr Magnússon is a Senior Programmer at CCP Games in Reykjavik.  He joined as an Associate Programmer working on EVE Online in 2008.  In 2014 he introduced event driven behavior trees to EVE Online. Since then he has continued to work on upgrading NPC behaviors and spawn mechanics to break content out of old stagnant molds. Recently he has been working with his team to create  large scale fleet fights with player fleets.  Freyr graduated with a bachelor degree in computer science from Reykjavik University.
